Posts.Content: Hi  Thanks - this must be the one I'm on - are you having the tram flap procedure  Thanks  Catherine
Posts.Title: Radiotherapy before mastectomy ?

Posts.Content: Hi all I've just finished neoadjuvant chemo 8 cycles and shall be having mastectomy and lymph node clearance and radiotherapy? They have said I can radiotherapy  before op - has anyone had this ?? Thanks
Posts.Title: Radiotherapy before mastectomy ?

Posts.Content: I think that's the stomachs skin one and I have had to go for back skin and muscle but having radiotherapy and then that op July! My friend had tummy one a couple of years ago and it was all fine. Hope it goes ok for you x
